description: {"blocks":[{"key":"cmavn","text":"This protocol details the fluorescence assay for Enterovirus A71 (EV-A71) 3C protease activity measurement. This method is intended to measure the activity of viral proteases by using a specific labelled-peptide that allows the detection of the cleaved product. The substrate contains the cleavage-sequence specific to the tested protease and is labeled in C-terminal by the fluorophore Edans (ex 336 nm; em: 455 nm) and in N-ternimal by the quencher Dabcyl (ex 472 nm). In the case of a non-cleaved substrate, the proximity of Dabcyl to Edans prevents the emission and the detection of the fluorescence at 455 nm. The cleavage of the peptide by the protease allows Edans’ fluorescence emission and detection.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bb672","text":"Incubate the mix for   at   and initiate the enzymatic reaction by adding of   of 2x ( ) substrate solution using the plate reader injector.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":21,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":26,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":77,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":86,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8eb7j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"3":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"10","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1seap","text":"Read the fluorescence intensity at 350/460 nm every 30 seconds for   in kinetic mode, which includes a shaking step of the plate before each measurement.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":67,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dq8lt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":7200,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4pjom","text":"Calculate the IC50 by plotting the initial velocity against various concentrations of tested inhibitors by using a four-parameter dose−response curve in Prism (v8.0) software.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"joqqo","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6jobj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"spectral","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"BB5B37BDF8B211EE99240A58A9FEAC02","height":171,"is_video":false,"link":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"Screenshot 2024-04-11 095034.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qaxrb8ux7.png","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qaxqb8ux7.png","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3rofa","text":"This method is intended to measure the activity of viral proteases by using a specific labelled-peptide that allows the detection of the cleaved product. The substrate contains the cleavage-sequence specific to the tested protease and is labeled in C-terminal by the fluorophore Edans (ex 336 nm; em: 455 nm) and in N-ternimal by the quencher Dabcyl (ex 472 nm). In the case of a non-cleaved substrate, the proximity of Dabcyl to Edans prevents the emission and the detection of the fluorescence at 455 nm. The cleavage of the peptide by the protease allows Edans’ fluorescence emission and detection.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cnie7","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8djni","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"spectral","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"D0D669CE031711EF953C0A58A9FEAC02","height":314,"is_video":false,"link":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"Screenshot 2024-04-25 162114.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qekib8ux7.png","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qekhb8ux7.png","width":550}}}}
